thread.title: Tokyo stadium could be world’s costliest
thread.title_full: Tokyo stadium could be world’s costliest

author: The Associated Press
title: Tokyo stadium could be world’s costliest
text:
Apartment Sales Tracker Home / Nation & World / Tokyo stadium could be world’s costliest Japan's National Stadium is dismantled March 5 to make way for a new venue for the 2020 Tokyo Olympic Games. When the dust settles on the marquee venue, it could be the most expensive sports stadium in the world at $2 billion, according to the latest cost estimate. (AP File Photo) Tokyo stadium could be world’s costliest By: The Associated Press July 15, 2015 12:32 pm 0 The latest cost estimate of 252 billion yen ($2 billion at current exchange rates) would push it beyond the current record-holder, the $1.6 billion MetLife stadium completed in 2010.
